Class RoomSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.data.RoomSummary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RoomSummary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stores summarised information about the room.

      • RoomSummary

        public RoomSummary(RoomSummary fromSummary,
                   Event event,
                   RoomState roomState,
                   java.lang.String userId)
        Create a room summary
        Parameters:
        fromSummary - the summary source
        event - the latest event of the room
        roomState - the room state - used to display the event
        userId - our own user id - used to display the room name

        Parameters:
        event - the event to test.
        Returns:
        true if the event can be summarized
